rows.label: qst102503_msg0001
rows.name:
Urghhh...
Thanks. I owe you one.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0002
rows.name: Yes, I...think I should be all right...

rows.label: qst102503_msg0003
rows.name:
I thought I would be safe if I just
reached Hræsvelgr Village, but I may
have overstretched myself a little...

rows.label: qst102503_msg0004
rows.name:
Pilolo sent you to look for me...?
Ah, so you are mercenaries as well!

rows.label: qst102503_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, this is most fortuitous.
Could you do a little job for me?

rows.label: qst102503_msg0006
rows.name: My field of research is Divine Beasts.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0007
rows.name:
For the sake of that research, I was
hoping to obtain some Dragon Incense
from inside the Dragon's Stomach.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0008
rows.name:
That Dragon Incense works wonders
when it comes to taming Divine Beasts.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0009
rows.name:
The last time I came here,
I was able to reach the Dragon's
Stomach without issue...

rows.label: qst102503_msg0010
rows.name:
But for some reason this time,
the path is blocked off and I
cannot reach it.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0011
rows.name:
If it's not too much trouble,
I'd like you to find me a way inside.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0012
rows.name:
I'll wait at the village of the
Hræsvelgr Mercenaries, so let me
know once the path is open.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0013
rows.name:
It might be a difficult task,
but I'm counting on you.
